about_the_game:
It's time to take a short, yet relaxing, walk!

Take a stroll around town and outside of it in this beautiful walking-sim, adventure game. Explore the shops and vistas in the area during day, night, sunrise. or sunset based on real-world time. Share in the emotions when surprising events unfold. Maybe you'll even find some secrets!

Interact with the world through a variety of hand-drawn perspectives.

Game Modes

  • Explore: A mode to wander the small town looking for new places to see.
  • Scavenger Hunt: Try to find all of the objects from a random list.
  • Hide-and-Seek: A friend is hiding somewhere in town; try to find them.
  • Stroll: Use the game as background ambience while you do something else.

Features:

  • A short, slow-paced walking experience!
  • Wander the town during 4 unique periods of the real-world day (morning, midday, evening, night).
  • Find and use various items to reach new places.
  • Interact with many interesting secrets hidden about.
  • Non-linear exploration.
  • Charming animation creates uniquely cinematic gameplay.
  • A variety of stunning locales.

name: Walk and Stroll

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Gold 4415Y 1.6GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.2GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Take a brief stroll in the beautiful walking-sim, adventure game: Walk and Stroll! See the sights, find items, and interact with things around town to make the impassable passable.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
